trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 10% on volume {#FSNAME}

item_prototype.name: Hyper-V Logical Processor
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Total Run Time"]

item_prototype.name: Hyper-V Virtual Processor
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Hyper-V Hypervisor Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Total Run Time"]

item_prototype.name: Number of Virtual Machines (Critical)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Critical"]

item_prototype.name: Number of Virtual Machines (Healthy)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Ok"]

discovery_rule.name: NIC Discovery
discovery_rule.filter: {#IFNAME}:"Broadcom NetXtreme Gigabit Ethernet"|"Broadcom NetXtreme Gigabit Ethernet #2"|"Broadcom NetXtreme Gigabit Ethernet #3"|"Broadcom NetXtreme Gigabit Ethernet #4"|"Microsoft Hyper-V Network Adapter"
